name: PowerCenter:Avoid unreferenced object in a mapping
description: List all the objects that have a Mapping as parent and that are never called, except pre/post or called Stored Procedure and Lookup.
output:
This report lists all Mappings and Mapplets which contains unreferenced objects
It provides the following information: Mapping or Mapplet full name, Object full name
rationale: Unreferenced objects in a mapping must be avoided as it makes Mapping less understandable and maintainable.
remediation: Check if the object is truly unnecessary and remove it.
sample: Create or copy object in a mapping without using and calling them.
total: Total number of Mappings and Mapplets
